title: Crater Lake National Park: How we find Crayfish
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Science & Research     Crayfish in Crater Lake     How we find Crayfish                How we find crayfish in Crater Lake         Crayfish traps loaded with bait. NPS  Two methods are used to find and count crayfish in Crater Lake,  Snorkel-divers swim the shoreline turning over rocks and counting crayfish,  Crayfish traps are set from the surface down to 300 meters deep.                     Crayfish collection techniques   6 Photos  A series of photos showing crayfish collection techniques.                         Searching for crayfish in rocky areas of Crater Lake.(object placeholder)       Crayfish walking near trap in Crater Lake(object placeholder)       Crayfish in rock crevice in Crater Lake(object placeholder)
